game.name: Bloody Shrine
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A twin-stick survivor shooter where you aim, you die, and the shrine laughs. Fight off waves of horrors using 50+ spells, 30+ weapons, and 100+ run-altering tokens. Build absurd synergies. Unlock cursed gear. Survive? Doubtful.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A twin-stick survivor shooter where you aim, you die, and the shrine laughs. Fight off waves of horrors using 50+ spells, 30+ weapons, and 100+ run-altering tokens. Build absurd synergies. Unlock cursed gear. Survive? Doubtful.
